mapper.select:
select l.id, l.module_name, l.content, l.ip, l.user_id, l.operator, l.operation_time, l.consume_time, l.create_time, (select u.user_name from user u where u.user_id = l.create_user) create_user, l.update_time, l.update_user, l.delete_flag from log l where delete_flag = '0' and content IS NOT null
and module_name like concat('%', #{moduleName},'%')
and operator like concat('%', #{operator},'%')
and operation_time >= #{operationTimeStart}
and operation_time < DATE_ADD(#{operationTimeEnd},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
order by operation_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into log( id, module_name, content, ip, user_id, operator, operation_time, consume_time, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, delete_flag ) values ( #{id}, #{moduleName}, #{content}, #{ip}, #{userId}, #{operator}, now(), #{consumeTime}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, '0' )
mapper.delete: delete from log where operation_time < date_format(ADDDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL #{month} MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d')
